addFunds.title: Add
addFunds.waitingText: Use the following address to transfer <0>{{assetName}}</0> to your DApp Store wallet.

appAllocations.caption: These are the DApps that you’ve transferred MOBI to but haven’t spent yet. Release a DApp balance if you’d like to return the coins to your primary balance.
appAllocations.title: Balance Allocation

appDepositForm.caption: Only put in as much as you’re willing to spend.
appDepositForm.confirmationText: The developer can take these coins at any point in time. We recommend depositing in smaller increments of 10 or 100, depending on how much you need to play.
appDepositForm.confirmationTitle: Are you sure you want to deposit this much?

assetAllocation.captionMobi: Use your MOBI to make purchases within DApps.
assetAllocation.captionNative: Each DApp you use puts a hold on 3 XLM until you close out the DApp balance.

balanceButtons.submitReserveConfirmationText: Opening this app will reserve 3 XLM in order to open a stellar account. You can release this account and receive the XLM back at any time from your account dashboard.

dappStore.submitText: The Mobius SDK makes it easy to start collecting coin payments.
dappStore.subtitle: Checkout great apps that you can pay for using MOBI.
dappStore.title: DApp Store

downloadKeypair.caption: You will need your key pair file in order to login to you wallet in the future. Store it in a safe place.
downloadKeypair.title: Download Your Key Pair

footer.trademarks: MOBIUS™, the MOBIUS logo, MOBI™, and The DApp Store™ are trademarks of Mochi, Inc. Product names, logos, and other trademarks referred to within mobius.network are the property of their respective trademark owners, as applicable. The owners of any such trademarks are not affiliated with Mobius or our products and services.

gettingStarted.caption: Everything you need to start developing and earning money in the DApp store.
gettingStarted.overviewDesc: Watch this video to get an overview of how DApps allow you to quickly and easily accept cryptocurrency payments.
gettingStarted.resourcesDesc: Use these resources to begin learning how to create and launch your DApp.
gettingStarted.title: Getting Started

login.caption: Access your wallet and submit DApps.
login.title: Login

mnemonic.caption: If you ever lose your key pair you can use your mnemonic phrase to recover your account.
mnemonic.title: Write Down Your Mnemonic Phrase

passwordForm.caption: We’ll create a new Mobius wallet for you to make purchases in the DApp store.
passwordForm.title: Sign Up

purchaseMobi.caption: Use your XLM balance to purchase MOBI.
purchaseMobi.title: Purchase MOBI

account.title: Step 1: Create DApp Account
account.explanation: You need to create DApp-specific account

form.descriptionFieldCaption: Give people a brief description of your DApp to help them better understand it’s purpose and value.
form.imageUrlFieldCaption: Must be a PNG image with 1024x1024 dimensions
form.supportUrlFieldCaption: Add your customer contact email, phone number, or other contact channel
form.taglineFieldCaption: In one sentence, what does your DApp do? (max 60 characters)
form.title: Step 2: DApp Info
form.urlFieldCaption: This is where we will send users to visit your DApp
form.websiteUrlFieldCaption: Do you have an informational home page?

transferMobi.caption: You’ll use your MOBI to make purchases within DApps.
transferMobi.externalTransferCaption: Use the following address to transfer MOBI to your DApp Store wallet.
transferMobi.title: Add MOBI

transferXlm.caption: DApp store transaction fees are charged from your XLM balance. You need to have a minimum balance of
transferXlm.title: Transfer XLM
transferXlm.waitingCaption: Use the following address to transfer XLM to your DApp Store wallet.

welcomeScreen.caption: Let’s finish setting up your Mobius wallet
welcomeScreen.firstStep: Transfer XLM to your new wallet
welcomeScreen.title: Welcome to Mobius!

withdrawForm.amountFieldCaption: Enter the amount of <0>{{assetName}</0> to transfer
withdrawForm.destinationFieldCaption: Enter the address of the external wallet
